main event: Unidentified flying object observed over Tokyo, Japan on 6 November 1957 and a similar sighting reported on 10 November 1957.
interesting points: The first sighting involved bright, elliptical objects of green-red color, seen for 10-15 seconds,The second sighting was a round object resembling dull reddish-orange, observed for a total of 20 minutes over two appearances,The objects appeared to be under intelligent control and maneuvering in unison,One witness reported a similar sighting to the first event,Reports suggest that the observed objects may have been misidentified meteors.
witness description: Tokyo residents and military personnel involved in the observation
